Class Reply

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.util.response.Reply
public class Reply extends Object
Utility class for creating standardized API responses.

Provides static methods to create ApiRes instances for various HTTP statuses.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static <T> ApiRes<Res<T>> create(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus status)
      Creates a response with the specified HTTP status and no body.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the response body
      Parameters:
      status - the HttpStatus of the response
      Returns:
      a new ApiRes instance with the specified status and no body

    • create

      public static <T> ApiRes<Res<T>> create(org.springframework.http.HttpStatus status, T message)
      Creates a response with the specified HTTP status and body.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the response body
      Parameters:
      status - the HttpStatus of the response
      message - the response body
      Returns:
      a new ApiRes instance with the specified status and body
